name: World Wide Whites Flight
description: La Fiera Pinot Grigio, 2024 | Loosen Riesling, Germany, 2023 | Matua, Marlborough, NZ, 2024 | La Crema Chardonnay, Monterey, 2023
serverNotes: World tour of white wines perfect for pairing with seafood and lighter dishes. Pinot Grigio pairs beautifully with Shrimp Scampi or Fried Calamari. Riesling complements Tuna Tartare or spicy dishes. Sauvignon Blanc matches Jumbo Shrimp Cocktail or Caesar Salad. Chardonnay pairs with Chicken Piccata or Pan Seared Octopus. Progressive flight from light to full-bodied whites - perfect for sharing across appetizers and seafood entr√©es. Great for exploring different white wine styles with food.

name: Tuscany vs. U.S.A Flight
description: San Felice Chianti Classico, DOCG, Tuscany, 2022 | Rubio by San Polo, IGT, Montalcino, JS 91, 2022 | Greenwing Cabernet by Duckhorn, Columbia Valley, 2023 | "The Pessimist" by Daou, 2023
serverNotes: Italian and American red wine flight perfect for pairing with our Italian classics. Chianti pairs beautifully with Chicken Parmesan, Eggplant Parmesan, or pasta with red sauce. Rubio Super Tuscan (JS 91) matches Ragu of Italian Meats or Three Meatballs. Washington Cabernet complements our steaks and Veal Chop Parmesan. The Pessimist pairs with Braised Short Rib or bold meat dishes. Perfect progression for Italian dinner - start lighter with pasta, finish with hearty meats. Great for comparing Old World Italian elegance to New World American power.

name: World Renowned Winemakers Flight
description: Guado Al Tasso, Vermentino, Tuscany, 2024 | Cakebread "Mullan Road", Washington, 2022 | Caparzo Brunello di Montalcino, DOCG, JS 94, 2018 | Rombauer, Chardonnay, Carneros, 2023
serverNotes: Premium wine flight for special occasions - pairs with our finest dishes. Vermentino complements Lobster Stuffed Shells or Pan Seared Octopus & Sausage. Red blend pairs with Veal Marsala or Filet Mignon. Brunello matches our premium steaks, Osso Buco, or Veal Chop Parmesan. Rombauer Chardonnay pairs with Pan Roasted Salmon or rich seafood dishes. World-class wines from legendary producers for an elevated dining experience. Perfect for anniversaries, celebrations, or wine enthusiasts wanting the best pairings with our signature dishes.
